overview: In Canada, in a landmark case of government oppression, 23 indigenous men and women off British Columbia's coast, were jailed for being themselves. Now, decades later, the society that once found them barbaric and 'unchristian', embrace them with wonderment and spiritual curiosity. In this visually stunning documentary, viewers meet inspiring people from Vancouver to Alert Bay and from Terrace to the Yukon whose lives are rooted in their culture, and whose call to dance is...beyond human power.
title: Beyond Human Power
